greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The infinite trunk of ternary beanstalk with reversed subsections.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..6250
program: (definec (A276624 n) (cond ((zero? n) n) ((= n 1) 2) (else (let ((maybe_next (* 2 (A054861 (A276624 (- n 1)))))) (if (not (= 1 (A053735 (+ 1 maybe_next)))) maybe_next (+ -1 (A000244 (+ 1 (A081604 (+ 1 maybe_next))))))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 11 2016
